title: Santhoshi N Krishnan
text:
I am currently a Postdoctoral Research Fellow in the department of Computational Medicine and Bioinformatics at the University of Michigan. My research entails developing statistical and machine learning-based models for the characterization of the disease microenvironment, with a special focus on the tumor-immune microenvironment(TIME).
## Education
Rice University | Houston, TX PhD in Electrical and Computer Engineering | Aug 2011 - July 2023
Rice University | Houston, TX MBE in Bioengineering | Aug 2015 - December 2016
SRM University | Chennai, India BTech in Biomedical Engineering | Aug 2011 - May 2015
